pylint_message: standard import "from xml.dom.minidom import getDOMImplementation, Node" should be placed before "import libxml2"
bandit_issue_text: Using getDOMImplementation to parse untrusted XML data is known to be vulnerable to XML attacks. Replace getDOMImplementation with the equivalent defusedxml package, or make sure defusedxml.defuse_stdlib() is called.
